value.stringValue: 4Dx Test; record results in SF. Notify medical lead of any positive results.
Notify Sheltering to switch to adult food.
Notify Sheltering to switch to adult food.
Check weight, nails and collar. Administer monthly preventatives by weight based on behavior (topical vs oral).
Check weight, nails and collar. Administer monthly preventatives by weight based on behavior (topical vs oral).
Annual exam, review history and chronic medications. Please schedule next annual exam in one year.
Please schedule next vaccines in one year.
Submit 1ml whole blood in LTT to NCSU VBDDL. Ship only Mon-Thurs.
Give intranasally, record expiration date and serial number.
Record weight in grams or kgs, compare to birth weight. If animal has not gained 10% of birthweight report to medical lead immediately.
